author: Lizzy Alport
comment: Really like the idea but when I mimic the code it just vibrates continuously in random patterns then shows a cross and the app closes, had potential.
title: Doesn't seem to work

author: Niel H
comment: And now with this app on my watch I just might be able to do so!
title: I've really wanted to learn Morse code!

author: Salmaan Tahir
comment: The app has a simple interface and is very easy to use! Great job!
title: Simple

author: Donovan Walker
comment: Every time I look at a letter I get a vibration. I don't want that and can't turn it off. It'd be nice if there was a 'show me' area that would do the vibration, and a 'try me' area where you could practice them.
title: Almost Great, but utter fail
